NewsItem.HEADLINE: In-Building Wireless Forecast (IBW) 2019
NewsItem.SUMMARY: This Excel sheet provides a quick summary of indoor Small Cells, DAS nodes, and Boosters.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: The simple sheet provides a quick-reference summary of the total number of radio nodes deployed in licensed bands for in-building wireless.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: DAS Small Cell Picocell DRS Booster Repeater
